wines.name: Caymus Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
wines.description: Rich and full-bodied with dark fruit flavors, vanilla, and spice. A classic Napa Valley Cabernet.

wines.name: Kendall-Jackson Vintner's Reserve Chardonnay 2022
wines.description: Crisp and elegant with tropical fruit flavors, vanilla, and a hint of oak. Perfect balance of richness and freshness.

wines.name: Willamette Valley Pinot Noir 2021
wines.description: Silky and complex with cherry, raspberry, and earthy undertones. Classic Oregon Pinot Noir elegance.

wines.name: Oyster Bay Sauvignon Blanc 2022
wines.description: Bright and zesty with tropical fruit, citrus, and herbaceous notes. Refreshing and crisp finish.

wines.name: Barolo Brunate 2018
wines.description: Powerful and structured with rose, tar, and red fruit. A legendary Barolo with incredible aging potential.

wines.name: Dom Pérignon Vintage 2013
wines.description: Elegant and refined with fine bubbles, citrus, and brioche notes. The epitome of luxury Champagne.

wines.name: Malbec Reserva 2020
wines.description: Bold and intense with dark plum, blackberry, and spice. Rich tannins with a long, smooth finish.

wines.name: Riesling Kabinett 2021
wines.description: Light and delicate with peach, apple, and mineral notes. Perfect balance of sweetness and acidity.

wines.name: Chianti Classico Riserva 2019
wines.description: Medium-bodied with cherry, leather, and herb notes. Classic Tuscan character with excellent structure.

wines.name: Moscato d'Asti 2022
wines.description: Sweet and aromatic with peach, apricot, and floral notes. Light and refreshing with gentle bubbles.

wines.name: Côtes du Rhône Rouge 2021
wines.description: Medium-bodied with red fruit, herbs, and spice. Classic French Rhône blend with excellent food pairing versatility.

wines.name: Prosecco di Valdobbiadene DOCG
wines.description: Fresh and lively with apple, pear, and citrus notes. Fine bubbles and crisp finish make it perfect for celebrations.

wines.name: Shiraz Reserve 2020
wines.description: Full-bodied with blackberry, pepper, and eucalyptus. Rich and powerful with excellent aging potential.

wines.name: Sancerre 2021
wines.description: Mineral-driven with citrus, grass, and stone fruit. Classic Loire Valley expression with excellent terroir.

wines.name: Zinfandel Old Vine 2021
wines.description: Bold and jammy with blackberry, spice, and pepper. Classic California Zinfandel with rich, concentrated flavors.

metadata.source: Curated wine database for Alexa Wine Assistant
